scripts.start-dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd api && nodemon --exec npm start" "cd web && npm start"
scripts.test: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd api && npm test" "cd web && npm test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd api && npm run lint" "cd web && npm run lint"
scripts.lint-fix: concurrently "cd web && npm run lint -- --fix" "cd api && npm run lint -- --fix"
scripts.fix: npm run fmt && npm run lint-fix
scripts.start: npm run build && cd api && npm start
scripts.install: npm run install-web && npm run install-api
